data.text: Gumazamiziba ghaze, nɨ gumazir aghuim, ezɨ me ziar ekiam nɨ ganɨdima, arazir kam bar dera. Guizbangɨra, ziar ekiam iniamin arazim, a dagɨar avɨriba iniamin arazim, bar a gafira.
Ikiavɨra Itir God gumazamiziba bar adar ingari, gumazamizir dagɨaba izɨvaziba ko gumazamizir onganarazibagh amiba.

Gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim itim, a gara fo, osɨmtɨzim a bativasava amima, a uabɨ modogha a gita. Ezɨ gumazir nɨghnɨziba puvatɨzim, an osɨmtɨzimɨn garima an an tuavimɨn itima, a ghua a batogha, osɨmtɨzim ateri.
Nɨ uabɨ dɨkabɨraghɨva Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn atiati an apengan ikɨ, dagɨar avɨriba ikɨva, ziar ekiam ini, deraghvɨra ikiam.
Bizir gumazamizibagh amima me daighira ikuvim, da gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amibar tuavimɨn iti. Eghtɨ gumazim deragh ikɨsɨ, a deraghvɨra uan darorimɨn ganɨva, bizir kurar kabagh itavɨragh.
Nɨ arazir aghuimɨn gɨn mangɨsɨ uan borimɨn sure damutɨ, a tuavir kamɨn mangɨvɨra ikɨ mangɨ a bar ghurigham.
Gumazir dagɨaba izɨvaziba gumazir biziba otevezibagh atifa. Ezɨ gumazir pura biziba inigha tɨghar da ikarvaghamiba, me gumazir pura biziba me ganɨdiba, men ingangarir gumazir kɨnibar mɨn iti.
Gumazir arazir kuram gamizim, dughiar kuram a bativam, eghtɨ a ua gumazir igharaziba pazɨ me damuan kogham.
Gumazir biziba isa gumazir igharazi bagha anɨdiba, me dagheba isa onganarazibagh amibagh anɨdi. Kamaghɨn, Ekiam me bagha bar akongegha deravɨra me gami.
Ia gumazir akaba dɨbovir akabav dav geiba, batueghtɨ, akamadariba ko akar kuraba gɨvagham.
Gumazim Godɨn damazimɨn zurara zuegh ikɨ, akaba deraghtɨ, atrivim an roroamɨn otogham.
Ikiavɨra Itir God deraghavɨra gumazir fofozir aghuim akakazimɨn gara, gumazir ifavaribar akaba, da dɨkabɨri.
Gumazir amɨrazim pura dɨpenimɨn apiav ikia kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Laionɨn tam ti tuavimɨn ikiama. Kamaghɨn kɨ tuavimɨn azenan mangɨghtɨ, laion na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremegham!”
Amizir akar asuibar gumazibav gɨa me isava me ko akuim, an akam mati mozir mam bar kone. Eghtɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God gumazitamɨn arazir kuraba ikarvaghɨva, an an teghtɨ a mozir kamɨn magɨrɨgham.
Boriba onganigha arazir igharagha garibagh ami. Ezɨ kamaghɨn nɨ me akɨrsɨ me mɨsueghtɨ, me arazir kam ategham.

Gumazim arazir kuramɨn onganarazibagh amir gumazamizibagh amuava, men biziba isi, ko gumazir dagɨaba izɨvazir gumazim bizir aghuim isa a ganɨdim, gumazir kamaghɨn amimning, uaning gumazir onganarazibagh amimningɨn mɨn ikiam.22:16 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba ko fofozim itibar akabar nɨn sure damuasa. Nɨ deraghvɨram akar kam baragh, egh a gɨnɨghnɨgh.
Nɨghnɨzir kam nɨn navir averiamɨn ikɨtɨ, nɨ an gun gumazir igharazim mɨkɨmtɨ, nɨn navim deragham.
Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn akar kamɨn gun mɨkɨmasa, eghtɨ nɨ uabɨ a baraghɨva, guizbangɨra nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ikiam.

Kɨ 30plan akar aghuiba osiri, da deragh nɨn sure damuva nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozim nɨ danɨngam.22:20 Hibrun akam akar otivir kam deragha a gɨfozir puvatɨ, “30plan akar aghuiba.” Gumazir maba kamaghɨn a gɨra, “Akar maba, da bar dera.” Ezɨ marazi ghaze, “Fomɨra itir akaba.”
Kamaghɨn nɨ guizɨn akamɨn mɨngarim gɨfogham. Egh gumaziba nɨ amadaghtɨ nɨ mangɨ fogh, akar manam guizbangɨra, nɨ foghɨva deraghvɨra me geghanam.
Nɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan kogh suam, onganarazibagh amir gumazamiziba me pura gumazir kɨniba, ezɨ nɨ pura men biziba isi. Eghtɨ kamaghɨn me kotiamɨn otoghtɨ, nɨ kotiamɨn me dɨkabɨnan markɨ.
Guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God me bagh ganɨva egh men akurvagham. Eghtɨ gumazitam pazɨ gumazir onganarazibagh amiba me damightɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God pazɨ gumazir kam damigham.
Nɨ gumazir zuamɨram atara puram anɨngaziba, me ko roroabar amuan markɨ.
Nɨ kamaghɨn damu, nɨ men arazim inightɨ, gɨn bizir kuraba azuazimɨn mɨn nɨ mɨsuegh nɨ gasɨghasigham.
Gumazim igharazitav dam pura bizim inightɨ, nɨ a ikarvaghsɨ puram akam akɨran markɨ.
Nɨ bizir kaba ikaraghan koghtɨ me nɨn biziba bar da inigh, nɨn dakozim uaghan a inigham.
Egh nɨn ovaviba bar fomɨra nɨn nguazimɨn mɨtaghniam gatɨzir ababanim gisɨvagh mangan markɨ.
Eghtɨ gumazir ingangarir aghuim gamim, an Atrivimɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn otogham. Kamaghɨn amir gumazim, a gumazir ziaba puvatɨzimɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn otivan kogham.
